name: Da Ji Da Li
tags: Long Strip,Comedy,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: Join us in the adventures of two hamsters of their daily activities.

name: I'm Not An Evil Antagonist Actress
nutshell: A b*tch-looking supporting actress made a pact with a handsome star actor with a creepy addiction for her career. Let's see how this strong girl will fight and reach her career success!

name: Boku no Mei
nutshell: "Smile for me with all your wrinkles."

name: Taberarechaukei Danshi
nutshell: In the corner of an office building there is a certain stall-village, the "Lunch Garden", where Haruto runs a curry stall. Yashima, his rival, runs a soup curry stall; a good-looking man with excellent skills, whose stall is always flocked with female customers. The self-conscious Haruto picks fights with him non-stop whenever they meet. Due to certain circumstances, the sponsors and organizers suddenly decided to suspend Haruto's stall?! Haruto, still disturbed and shaken by the news, was surprised when Yashima, who was supposed to be his rival, unexpectedly stood up for him…?!

name: In Bura!
nutshell: After an accident, our protagonist Amagi Kouichi becomes involved with Itanami-san, a well known beauty of his school and secretly a vampire.Portuguese (BR) / Português (BR)Depois de um acidente, nosso protagonista Amagi Kouichi acabou se envolvendo com uma bela garota, Itanami-san, ela frequenta a mesma escola que ele e também é secretamente uma vampira.

name: Kidou Ryodan Hachifukujin
nutshell:
Kidou Ryodan Hachifukujin is set in the near future where Japan has been subjugated by China
and now fights against its former ally America under the Chinese banner.
Fukujin, literally “luck god,” are advanced armor suits that are impervious to most conventional weapons.
The story follows a bunch of new recruits in the army of Japan trying to survive in that war-torn future.
An eccentric girl, a pacifistic guy and a Fukujin figure in this story about war, violence, and militaristic subservience.

name: Tsuburara
nutshell:
Tsubura is an ordinary high-school girl who has an obsession with the girl idol group Caramel Angel. She's a little embarrassed of the extent of her fascination, particularly because she doesn't seem like the kind of girl who would fawn over idols. In the privacy of her own home, though, she blissfully hangs out in her C☆A-postered room and never misses their music performance on TV.
Then, on one unlucky day, she accidentally breaks her family's TV. Her mother is in no rush to replace it, and Tsubura doesn't have the money to do it herself. How will she overcome this terrible crisis and get her fix of Caramel Angel?!

name: Freaks Freak Company
nutshell: About 200 years ago, the world was changed by the appearance of 'freaks', man-eating monsters. People lived in cities to defend themselves from the Outer World, which was filling up with monsters. Becky Logan, a young 'travelling doctor', decided to travel to the Outer World in search of her brother who had been missing for two years. In her search for a travelling companion, Becky meets the Freaks Freak Company, a group of three men led by the 'deformity hunter' Jake Lambarto.

name: My Female Friend Became My Practice Partner So I Can Get Better at Sex with my Boyfriend
nutshell: One girl wants to practice sex, her friend is eager to help.

name: Shingeki no Kyojin - Delusional Hierarchy (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Pairing: Levi x Eren
"I've always been scared of him…"

name: Ao Ringo Kiss
nutshell:
Collection of one-shots:


Green Apple Kiss (Ao Ringo Kiss)
Ao Ringo Kiss is about a girl who is a big fan of the idol group G-A and often writes letters to Satoya. One day on a class trip to Tokyo he suddenly appears while she's been confessed to by a boy and takes her away.


Himitsu no Ao Ringo


Setsunai Ao Ringo


Angel Darling


Sonogo…Angel Darling

name: Sensual Novelist and High Schooler Yuri
Make My Demon Boss Lovestruck
nutshell:
Shy office worker x a Tsundere sweets-loving boss
While desperately searching for a certain photo, she saw her boss, Hibiki Hasegawa making sweets!? She was so surprised because he has a terrible reputation in the company and in her surprise, she accidentally raised her voice and was then caught by him. [His true identity, which I thought was a demon boss, is actually a Tsundere!]

name: BanG Dream! - chulips! (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A Moca x Ran doujin.

name: The Regent King Is Too Ferocious
nutshell: I died of a young age in my previous life, but unknowingly I went back in time to the past where dynasties still existed. However, this was not even a blessing. The me from that life died, killed by her own husband, the emperor. And now, I am reborn into a little girl, who is the sister of the emperor?!

name: E? Heibon Desu yo??
nutshell: Yukari was a high school student when she died in a traffic accident, but when she woke up, she had been reincarnated as the daughter of a count in another world! But strangely, what was waiting for her was a life of poverty, so she decided to make use of the knowledge from her previous life.

name: Shutter Love
nutshell:
The story of two school friends Maki and Yumi. Asai, a young professional photographer, notices Maki who is very talented in photography. He introduces his girlfriend, Sai, to her. Sai is also a photographer, but she's not motivated anymore…
But when love interferes with their lives everything is in turmoil… Between abuse and feelings, prepare to dive in an unforgettable story.

name: Kunisaki Izumo no Jijou
nutshell: Meet Izumo Kunisaki, a descendant of Izumo no Okuni. The fact that he's often mistaken for a girl is the bane of his existence. His father and best-friend often laugh about his troubles. To top it off, he plays the female roles in his family's Kabuki troupe. Follow along as he discovers that his curse is also his greatest strength, and will show just how much of a man he is.

name: X-Gene
nutshell: X-gene is about a few chosen people, whose DNA contains genes from certain unique animals that can turn them into that animal and receive its attributes. What makes this game even more deadly is that they can kill and consume other X-genes powers and use it for themselves. But they need to hurry, for only one can enter the ark.

name: Yankano!
nutshell: New Student by the name of Masato Takasaka transfers to a school full of delinquents which is currently undergoing a battle between the various student activities committees, his fleeting expectations of delicate and loving school girls and a peaceful school life go out the window, the moment he meets the declared queen of the school Onizuka while walking down a hallway, what will happen to the school life he dreams of in this romantic/comedy of two unlikely partners in school full of delinquents.

name: Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica - HomuMado Kiss (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Homura x Madoka

name: Soup o Tsukuru
nutshell: RAW: http://www.comic-zenon.jp/tachiyomi/pc/soup.html

name: Lovely Baby
nutshell: My name is Kohinata An. My parents went overseas to work and left me to live with my grandma. However, she was hospitalized all of a sudden, leaving me as the manager of her lodging house! Furthermore, there are three cool guys lodging there! Ba-dump. Ba-dump. But one of these three guys, Ryuu-kun, seems to hate me for some reason… What for–?!

name: The Road to Heaven
nutshell: Adapted from the novel of the same name by the net literary god innocent. Wei Suo, a low-level small casual cultivator in Lingyue City, was unfortunately deceived during a transaction and obtained a broken low-level magic weapon. But in this broken magic weapon that is worthless, there is a spirit that has lived for tens of thousands of years. As a blessing in disguise, Wei Suo’s adventure journey begins…

name: Giri Koi
nutshell: Mao has just graduated middle school, and due to where she lives, she has to go to a different school from all her friends. While trying to find her new classroom, Mao stumbles upon a boy being bullied. She gets the bullies to go away, only to find that the boy, Riku, wasn't being bullied at all. Nonetheless, Riku respects her now, and refers to her as "Prince," for saving him. How will their relationship continue…?

name: Ryuuku Ai Utsu
nutshell:
One night, brash blonde high school student Toraji went to a party with his childhood best friend, Ryunosuke. At the party, they both got lucky and ended up having a threesome with a cute girl. However, in the heat of the moment, Ryunosuke leaned over the girl's shoulder and kissed Toraji deeply! What's a yankee boy to do when he realizes his best friend is in love with him!?
This volume also contains "ONE ON ONE", a story about a delinquent's first love with the delinquent senpai he needs to fight!

name: Majime-chan to Kimama-kun
nutshell: Story about a couple who are complete opposites, yet belong together.

name: Oujisama wa Inai
nutshell:
Oujisama ni Narenai


Magic Chip wa Uso (w)o Tsuku


Machi Kado Tissue


Home Sick Baby (From Echochi Scans)
Three years ago, Yuusuke revealed to his family his preference of men. But after seeing their reaction, he ran away from home and has lost contact ever since. Now he has become a freeter, not knowing what to do with his life. Whilst shopping, he meets a man who loves riceballs. How will the power of the riceball change Yuusuke?


Takeshima Bowling and Closing Preparations

name: The Insect (MATSUMOTO Leiji)
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Hajime Saito is a young man with nothing to show for his wealth. He has been evicted from his apartment for nonpayment of rent, and wanders around town with nothing to show for it.
Saito, who has nowhere to turn, is drawn to trivial insects such as mayflies and minnows, which attract no one's attention. Insects and people, both of whom have only a fleeting and short life, are no different in the sorrow of living...
Leiji Matsumoto depicts the cruelty and toughness of life in this sad one-shot collection.
